text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Now you want to talk about what’s happening in the middle of a Global crisis??? Let’s start with where are the Covid-19 tests and how can I get tested? You are such a loser!#WorstPresidentInHistory #RepublicansAreDestroyingAmerica #TrumpPandemic #TrumpRepublicanPartyAreLosers
